items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t believe that Mary actually liked him.
Tom cut his finger and it\'s bleeding pretty badly.
Tom didn\'t know what to do with the leftover food.
Tom didn\'t stay in Boston as long as he wanted to.
I want to find out if the warranty has expired yet.
I want to get there early so we can get good seats.
I want to live in a country where French is spoken.
I want to speak to you about what needs to be done.
As soon as Tom gets here, we\'ll start the meeting.
The man I met yesterday didn\'t know French at all.
The new restaurant on Park Street isn\'t very good.
When I realized it was raining, I took my umbrella.
When did you say you would be going to the library?
Why did you leave the light on in the meeting room?
Tom shouldn\'t have gone out after dark by himself.
You\'re one of the most generous people I ever met.
Yesterday I had a horrible accident on the highway.
Yesterday I happened to run into Tom on the street.

Tom doesn\'t brush his teeth as often as he should.
